sentences: In its conclusions ( FCCC/SBI/2009/L.26 ) the SBI: recalls decision 10/CP.13; notes that it began consideration of the date of submission of the sixth national communications of Annex I parties but could not agree at this session; agrees to set the date of submission at SBI 32, with a view that such a date shall be no later than four years after the due date of submission of the fifth national communications of Annex I parties; agrees to forward, at SBI 32, a draft decision, setting the date of submission to COP 16 for adoption; and agrees to continue consideration of other matters under this agenda item at SBI 32. CAPACITY BUILDING (CONVENTION): This agenda item (FCCC/SBI/2009/4-5 and MISCs.1-2) was first considered by the SBI in plenary on 8 December, when Chair Bratasida reported on agreement to defer consideration of the agenda item to SBI 32.
SBI conclusions were adopted on 12 December and a draft COP decision was adopted on 18 December.
